name: Aureole (Elvendwarf) (Elvendwarf)
description:
Aureole is finally here! 

Aureole is a newfangled physics-based platform game, jump and fly through 45 levels spread over 3 totally different worlds.
 Or take on the community in Ranked Play mode!

Can you handle the challenge?

**Note: If you want to save your progress download the windows version or login into Trail.gg

1.0.1 UPDATES ✨✨✨✨:

-Correction of resolution of some icons
-Now the logos screen can be skipped
-First levels more intuitive
-general performance improvement
